actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Parks, Preservation and Recreation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation

official_title: A bill to provide for reimbursement of States, political subdivisions, and persons that donated services, material, funds, or other things to allow the continued operation, during a period of time when appropriations were not available for the purpose, of all or any part of a public educational or recreational facility, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the head of any Federal department, agency, or entity to which a State, political subdivision, or person donated materials, funds, or services to allow the continued operation of all or part of a public educational or recreational facility, during a period of unavailability of appropriations for such facility, to reimburse such donor, at the donor's request, for expenses reasonably incurred or for the value of the materials or services donated. Defines a public educational or recreational facility as a unit of a national park system or other Federal facility established to provide educational or recreational opportunities to the general public. Authorizes appropriations for such reimbursement.

titles.title: A bill to provide for reimbursement of States, political subdivisions, and persons that donated services, material, funds, or other things to allow the continued operation, during a period of time when appropriations were not available for the purpose, of all or any part of a public educational or recreational facility, and for other purposes.
